content: AIC offers programmes for early childhood professionals. For new educators: Fundamentals Certificate in Early Childhood Care and Education, WSQ Higher Certificate in Infant Care, WSQ Advanced Certificate in Early Years. For existing professionals: Bachelor of Arts (Honours) Early Childhood Studies (Birmingham City University), WSQ Professional Diploma in Early Childhood Care & Education, Specialist Diploma in Special Education Needs (Preschool). Other courses include Early Years Development Framework and storytelling modules.

Tuition fees vary by programme and intake. Please contact admissions for the latest fee schedule. Fees may be subject to GST. Fee protection scheme and instalment options are available. International students should refer to the international student information page for applicable fees.

Admissions: Why Choose AIC, Courses, Academic Calendar, How to Apply, Info for International Students. Campus: 11 Eunos Road 8, #04-01 Lifelong Learning Institute, Singapore 408601. Enquiries: +65 6336 8335, enquiries@aic.edu.sg.
